title: Exclusive: New MacBook Air and 13-inch MacBook Pro with M2 coming later this year
content:
It has been almost two years since Apple announced the transition from Intel Macs to Apple Silicon, and while there are still two Intel-powered Macs in the lineup, the company is already working on the next wave of Macs with the new M2 chip. 9to5Mac has learned from sources that there are new MacBooks with the M2 chip coming later this year.

moreâ€¦

The post Exclusive: New MacBook Air and 13-inch MacBook Pro with M2 coming later this year appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: 9to5Mac has learned from sources that Apple has been working on a new MacBook Air and 13-inch MacBook Pro with the M2 chip.
